attributes.action: The department of work and pensions to administer mps expenses mps to claim expenses at job centres
attributes.additional_details: Members of parliament claim that the independent parliamentary standards authority are unjust with their expense claims and are reducing them to poverty. Many of the same MPs routinely assert the benefits system is far too generous and claimants live a life of luxury. Accordingly i propose to that mps should claim their expenses through the benefit system which should allay their concerns
